name: part_003
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2025】生誕 3D LIVE 睡夢 - suimu -【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [eV59GTk0J3s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel and Nakiri Ayame perform 'Ashita no Watashi ni Sachi Are'.
scenes.song_name: Ashita no Watashi ni Sachi Are

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel, Yukihana Lamy, and Oozora Subaru perform 'Edison'.

subtitles.original: ユメクイ　ユメクイ
subtitles.english: Dream Eater, Dream Eater

subtitles.original: バイバイ　バイバイ
subtitles.english: Bye-bye, bye-bye

subtitles.original: ハンパないっ ぱらっ ぱっぱらっぱらっぱらっ
subtitles.english: It's unreal, pa-ra-ppa-ra-ppa-ra-ppa-ra

subtitles.original: Hey 限界 突破らっ ぱっぱらっぱらっぱらっ
subtitles.english: Hey, break through the limit, pa-ra-ppa-ra-ppa-ra-ppa-ra

subtitles.original: Hey 毎日 ハンパないっ ぱらっ ぱっぱらっぱらっぱらっ
subtitles.english: Hey, every day is unreal, pa-ra-ppa-ra-ppa-ra-ppa-ra

subtitles.original: Hey 限界 突破らっ ぱっぱらっぱらっぱらっ
subtitles.english: Hey, break through the limit, pa-ra-ppa-ra-ppa-ra-ppa-ra

subtitles.original: Hey
subtitles.english: Hey

subtitles.original: 最適温度　ふさぎ切るコスト
subtitles.english: Optimal temperature, costs that block everything out

subtitles.original: 八百万の　嫌な外的要素
subtitles.english: Countless unpleasant external factors

subtitles.original: なんの気ないと　超あっけらかんと
subtitles.english: So nonchalantly, so indifferently

subtitles.original: 悪気もなく　お邪魔するとか　誰かさんにバイバイ
subtitles.english: Intruding without any malice, say goodbye to someone

subtitles.original: 自分時間　だらくタイム確保　5時9時を死守しますと
subtitles.english: Secure my personal lazy time, I'll defend my 5-to-9

subtitles.original: さらに愛や　恋や　甘いもん忘れずに　とどのつまり
subtitles.english: Don't forget love, romance, and sweets, in short

subtitles.original: オーバーワークは立ち入り禁止ですよ　手注意喚起もしてますよ
subtitles.english: Overwork is strictly prohibited, I'm issuing a warning

subtitles.original: ねえ楽して　上手くして　生きてくって難しいな
subtitles.english: Hey, living life easily and doing it well is hard

subtitles.original: だって安手　裏技　一夜漬け　甘い水には罠がある
subtitles.english: Cheap tricks, shortcuts, cramming, sweet water has traps

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: 眠くなったら寝る
subtitles.english: Sleep when I'm sleepy

subtitles.original: お昼過ぎに起きる
subtitles.english: Wake up past noon

subtitles.original: 遊びたきゃ遊ぶ
subtitles.english: Play if I want to play

subtitles.original: お腹減ったらご飯を食べる
subtitles.english: Eat when I'm hungry

subtitles.original: 嬉しかったら笑う
subtitles.english: Laugh when I'm happy

subtitles.original: 悲しかったら泣いてもいいんじゃない
subtitles.english: If I'm sad, it's okay to cry, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 明日の私のために今日もなんとか頑張るのさ
subtitles.english: For tomorrow's me, I'll manage to do my best today

subtitles.original: 明日も頑張らなくていいように頑張るのさ
subtitles.english: Working hard so I won't have to tomorrow

subtitles.original: 総体じゃないや　これ多分そうだ　なんやでやることやってます
subtitles.english: It's not everything, but maybe this is it, somehow I'm getting things done

subtitles.original: What? & If?
subtitles.english: What? & If?

subtitles.original: 誰に知られなくたって別にいいから
subtitles.english: I don't care if no one knows

subtitles.original: 私には私のマイルール　明日楽するためにはハイチーズ
subtitles.english: I have my own rules, say 'cheese' to make tomorrow easier

subtitles.original: 意外とこんな感じで　ラブアンドピースのある毎日を生きたいのです
subtitles.english: I want to live every day like this, with love and peace

subtitles.original: Don't be shy　ドキドキしたい
subtitles.english: Don't be shy, I want to feel my heart pound

subtitles.original: Let me shine　明日天気になれ
subtitles.english: Let me shine, let the weather be good tomorrow

subtitles.original: To be excite　心もっと踊りたい
subtitles.english: To be excited, I want my heart to dance more

subtitles.original: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday
subtitles.english: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday

subtitles.original: 辛くなったら歌う
subtitles.english: Sing when it's hard

subtitles.original: むかついたら愚痴る
subtitles.english: Complain when I'm annoyed

subtitles.original: やりたいようにやる
subtitles.english: Do it the way I want to

subtitles.original: それができたら苦労しないわ
subtitles.english: If I could do that, I wouldn't be struggling

subtitles.original: 常に一喜一憂　してりゃ何あろうと思ったんかな
subtitles.english: Always swinging between joy and sorrow, I wonder what I thought would happen

subtitles.original: 適当にセーブ　ディスクは返し　でも頑張るのさ
subtitles.english: Save appropriately, return the disk, but still do my best

subtitles.original: 適当にまでとは言わないが　まぁ頑張るのさ
subtitles.english: I won't say I'll be half-hearted, but well, I'll do my best

subtitles.original: 夢の中では　ずっとぐーたらしてやるんだ
subtitles.english: In my dreams, I'm going to be lazy all the time

subtitles.original: 誰かのためとかそんなんじゃなく　明日の私のために　Fight
subtitles.english: Not for someone else, but for tomorrow's me, fight!

subtitles.original: 楽するために苦しいことも　乗り越えちゃうんだからね　Fight
subtitles.english: I'll even overcome hard things so I can take it easy later, fight!

subtitles.original: やりたくないこと　やらないために　やりたくないこと　やれ　Fight
subtitles.english: To avoid things you don't want to do, do the things you don't want to, fight!

subtitles.original: あれ？これって結局　頑張れてる私　とってもえらいじゃないか　Fight
subtitles.english: Huh? In the end, isn't me who's working hard really great? Fight!

subtitles.original: 自分時間　だらくタイム確保　5時9時を死守しますと
subtitles.english: Secure my personal lazy time, I'll defend my 5-to-9

subtitles.original: さらに愛や　恋や　甘いもん忘れずに　とどのつまり
subtitles.english: Don't forget love, romance, and sweets, in short

subtitles.original: 踊る暇があったら発明して
subtitles.english: If you have time to dance, invent something

subtitles.original: 歌う暇があったら発明して
subtitles.english: If you have time to sing, invent something

subtitles.original: ライブのブッキング蹴って発明して
subtitles.english: Cancel your live bookings and invent something

subtitles.original: そんな発明王にオレはなる
subtitles.english: I'll become an inventor king like that

subtitles.english: Dancing Edison, self-esteem

subtitles.original: 幼少期の頃から家で聴いてた音楽はハウスミュージック
subtitles.english: Since childhood, the music I listened to at home was house music

subtitles.original: サブスクのプレイリスト聞いて曲ディグったならばクラブでDJ
subtitles.english: I listened to sub playlists, and if I dug a track I'd DJ it at the club

subtitles.original: パソコン開いたならDTM　ソフトはAbleton Live
subtitles.english: If I open my PC it's DTM, the software is Ableton Live
